name: A Bird Game
description:
The world is empty and destroyed. The human empire is long gone.
But one bird endures and tries to find his future in a desert of what remains.

A Bird Game is a puzzle platformer with a unique main mechanic. The player controls a bird in common platformer manner but also two beams of colour. The colour removes certain parts of the level and must be utilized to beat the game.

How to play:
WASD - for walking, jumping and plunging down mid-air
Space - may also be used to jump
R - Restart the level
Mouse Click - move the beams to where you click

Sincerely,

The Not So Secret Bird Society

Credits:
Art: Marc
Programming: Claas & Johannsi
Music: Nicolas Rathje

Created in 48 hours at the Global Game Jam 2020
